snippet.title: Noun Town Language Learning | PC / Desktop Launch Trailer 2023
snippet.description:
Noun Town Language Learning will be releasing in Early Access on Steam on November 2nd, 2023.

Get it here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2313720?utm_source=YTTrailer

Experience the new way to learn a foreign language! Interact, listen, read, and speak your chosen language in a world that regains color as you learn. Test your skills with mini-games & talk to the local villagers. Learn Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, and more…

For more information, follow Noun Town on social media:  

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@nountownlanguagelearning
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nountownlanguagelearning/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NounTownLanguageLearning
Discord: https://discord.gg/3K3jWtCy3H
Threads: https://www.threads.net/@nountownlanguagelearning
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_NounTown

#NounTownLanguageLearning #NounTown #indiegame #cozygame #cozy #edtech #madewithunity 

--------------------------------------------
Credits:
Trailer - Duncan Robson
Composer - Mikey Parsons
--------------------------------------------
